**Example**

```esql
FROM books
| WHERE TERM(author, "gabriel")
| KEEP book_no, title
| LIMIT 3
```

| book_no:keyword | title:text |
| --- | --- |
| 4814 | El Coronel No Tiene Quien Le Escriba / No One Writes to the Colonel (Spanish Edition) |
| 4917 | Autumn of the Patriarch |
| 6380 | La hojarasca (Spanish Edition) |
